title: Instagram Stories and DMs now support Metaâ€™s 3D avatars
content:
In a bid to compete with Snap’s Bitmoji feature, Facebook (now Meta) launched Avatars all the way back in 2019. At first, the feature was only available in Australia, but Facebook released it in other markets over the course of a year. As its name suggests, the feature lets you create a virtual avatar of

The post Instagram Stories and DMs now support Meta’s 3D avatars appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Instagram users in the US, Canada, and Mexico can now share their 3D Avatars via Instagram Stories and DMs. Read on to learn more.
